segments.text: I think the government needs a radical plan to improve things . The government just talks , but in the long run , nothing is done to improve the economy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . They always talk about a need for new , progressive tactics , but they haven't done anything to stimulate new jobs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , income taxes were decreased last year in hope to give the economy a boost , but I think it's backfired . The immediate effect of the tax reduction was to cause inflation to rise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The worst part is that the inflation hurts the poor more than the rich . It also leads to more unemployment in the long run . I don't know what a good solution would be to make the economy more vibrant again ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a good solution ... We need some new blood ! We should get rid of this president and boat in some new leaders !
segments.speaker: S1
